thought: I need to implement the Slack message sending action to send the list of files to the #general channel.
plan: Set channelId mode to 'name' and value to 'general' to send message to #general channel.
Set messageType to 'text' to send a simple text message.
The message text will be set dynamically in the workflow, so here we just prepare the action to accept input data with 'text' field.
Test the Slack message sending to ensure messages are posted correctly.
criticism: The main challenge is to ensure that the message text is correctly passed from the workflow input data to the Slack action for sending messages.

tool_input.comments: Send a message to Slack channel #general with the given text content.
TODO: Test Slack message sending with dynamic text.
Verify message formatting in Slack channel.
